body:
### Steps to reproduce

```
spack env create foo
spack env activate foo
spack external find --scope env:foo
spack develop lbann [some args]
spack concretize --reuse lbann [some args]
spack install --reuse lbann [some args]
```
Followed by
```
spack env rm foo
spack env create foo
spack env activate foo
spack external find --scope env:foo
spack develop lbann [some args]
spack concretize --reuse lbann [some args]
spack install --reuse lbann [some args]
```
